body_html:
Is that the error from conda or from pip? Where is your conda environment set located? In your user folder or Program Files? Tried running cmd as an administrator?
A reinstall of conda might solve this.
This doesn't appear to be a tensorflow bug so I would move your question to Stack Overflow or to Conda forums.

body:
Is that the error from conda or from pip? Where is your conda environment set located? In your user folder or Program Files? Tried running cmd as an administrator?
A reinstall of conda might solve this. 
This doesn't appear to be a tensorflow bug so I would move your question to Stack Overflow or to Conda forums.
